alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Mercer; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:31AM CDT until July 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN GRUNDY...NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN...MERCER...WESTERN PUTNAM AND NORTHEASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 831 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Corydon to 6 miles east of Princeton to near Bethany, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Ridgeway, Mercer, Cainsville, Spickard, Newtown, Pollock, Mount Moriah, Lucerne, Tindall, Harris, Powersville, Osgood, South Lineville, Modena and Mill Grove. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 96 and 98. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
